tool.name: execute_knowledge_search
tool.title: Knowledge Search
tool.description: Search your personal knowledge base including uploaded documents, notes, and saved content. Use when users ask to 'search my knowledge', 'find in my documents', 'look in my notes', 'search my files', or reference previously uploaded/saved information. This searches ONLY internal content you've uploaded or saved, NOT external web content.

query.name: query
query.description: The search query to find relevant knowledge from your personal knowledge base

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

includeNodes.name: includeNodes
includeNodes.description: Include knowledge graph nodes in results

results.description: Array of knowledge chunks and nodes matching the query from your personal knowledge base

metadata.author: ZeroLoop
sampleUseCases: Search uploaded documents: 'find in my documents about AI', 'search my notes on machine learning'
Find saved insights: 'what did I save about React hooks', 'look in my knowledge base for TypeScript tips'
Retrieve personal content: 'search my files for project planning', 'find my notes on database design'
Semantic search: 'find similar concepts to neural networks in my knowledge base'
negativeExamples: Don't use for external web searches or current events
Don't use for Jira projects or issue management
Don't use for GitHub repository information
Don't use for real-time or current information from the internet
metadata.suggestedPrompt: Search my knowledge base for information about artificial intelligence
